publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1038 Malcolm Chisholm: The Draft Primary Medical Services (Scotland) Act 2004 (Modification of Enactments) Order 2004â€”That the Health Committee recommends that the Draft Primary Medical Services (Scotland) Act 2004 (Modification of Enactments) Order 2004 be approved.

S2M-1038 Malcolm Chisholm: The Draft Primary Medical Services (Scotland) Act 2004 (Modification of Enactments) Order 2004-That the Health Committee recommends that the Draft Primary Medical Services (Scotland) Act 2004 (Modification of Enactments) Order 2004 be approved. Supported by: Mr Tom McCabe
